GapFillInput.Title: Past simple: irregular verbs
GapFillInput.Instruction: Put the verb in brackets into the correct form of the Past simple.

Content.Question:
1. J. K. Rowling wrote (write) the Harry Potter books.
2. The lesson began (begin) at 10.00 a.m.
3. We went (go) to a concert last weekend.
4. Yesterday I met (meet) a friend at a caf√©.
5. The band made (make) their first album last year.
6. We sang (sing) a lot of songs at the party.
7. Charles became (become) a doctor when he was 25.
8. They had (have) lunch at a restaurant last Tuesday.
9. I left (leave) university in June 2001.
10. The shop sold (sell) newspapers and books.
